author.name: lacabezaenlasnubes
author.authordescription: Spain. His work is inspired by his early fondness on surrealism and psychedelia. The 'normal' perception of things has long ceased to interest him. He firmly believes that what we perceive through our senses is only the tip of the iceberg.
